title: Another
summary: A transfer student uncovers a deadly curse haunting his class, leading to chilling deaths and unsettling mysteries.

title: Tokyo Ghoul
summary: A college student becomes a half-ghoul, navigating a world of flesh-eating creatures while trying to hold onto his humanity.

title: Higurashi: When They Cry
summary: A peaceful village harbors dark secrets, with sinister events unfolding during a yearly festival, leading to madness and murder.

title: Parasyte: The Maxim
summary: A high school student battles parasitic creatures taking over humans while forming a complex bond with one of them.

title: Elfen Lied
summary: A mutant girl with psychic powers escapes a research facility, wreaking havoc while grappling with her violent past.

title: Shiki
summary: A remote village is plagued by mysterious deaths, leading to a battle between humans and vampires for survival.

title: Corpse Party: Tortured Souls
summary: A group of students perform a ritual and find themselves trapped in a haunted school filled with vengeful spirits.

title: Hell Girl
summary: A mysterious girl offers people revenge by sending their enemies to Hell, at the cost of their own souls.

title: Devilman Crybaby
summary: A sensitive young man merges with a demon to protect humanity from monstrous threats, while grappling with his new identity.

title: Yamishibai: Japanese Ghost Stories
summary: A series of short episodes narrating eerie ghost stories and urban legends inspired by Japanese folklore.
